item.title: ðŸ“š Online Courses for Software Engineers and Data Scientists
item.description: The online courses that I have completed are the following: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate by Linux Academy Machine Learning Engineer Udacity Nanogree by Udacity Machine Learning DevOps Engineer by Udacity (in progress) I will provide a summary and evaluation and outline key learnings from these courses taking a Data Scientist lense.
